Body:
"""Tests for the function that sets the output filename
    
    Notes
    -----
    If adding more star inits, remember to os.rmdir(st.path) to clean up after
    the test. 
    
    """
pth = f'{os.getcwd()}/pbjam/tests'
pg = lk.periodogram.Periodogram(np.array([1, 1]) * units.microhertz, units.
    Quantity(np.array([1, 1]), None))
st = star('thisisatest', pg, (220.0, 3.0), (16.97, 0.05), (4750, 250), (
    1.34, 0.1))
func = st._set_outpath
assert os.path.isdir(st.path)
os.rmdir(st.path)
inp = [pth]
func(*inp)
assert os.path.isdir(st.path)
os.rmdir(st.path)
